title: Blood Moon Screensplashs
body: All of the Blood Moon screensplashs share similar characteristics. And then there's Akali and Kalista's. I don't know, i just feel like their screensplashs don't fit the theme of the others. Maybe Shen's as well

replies.body: Kalista's fits it well; Akali's is just old and will probably get a visual update soon

akali in the blood moon lore is kinda different from everyone else.  originaly it was her and shen doing a play for the townsfolk akali being troubled by her inner demons (played by shen).  she eventually donned the mask and confronted them.  in the new lore? idk, maby shes a spy and is infiltrating the cult

screensplash? that's not what we call them

also Kalista's splash fits the theme really well, Akali needs a VGU
